snippet: The Supreme Court struggled to decide whether it was capable of doing anything to affect the outcome of the case involving an American Army sergeant and a British citizen.
abstract: Supreme Court struggles to decide whether it is capable of doing anything to affect outcome of custody case in Scotland involving American Army sergeant Jeffrey L Chafin and his British former wife Lynne H Chafin.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court struggled to decide whether it was capable of doing anything to affect the outcome of the case involving an American Army sergeant and a British citizen.

headline.seo: Supreme Court Hears Arguments in International Child Custody Case
headline.main: Custody Case in Scotland Goes Before U.S. Justices
headline.print_headline: Custody Case in Scotland Goes Before U.S. Justices
